room_title: Escape room "Vanished in Roswell" by Kryptology Escape Rooms in Pigeon Forge
room_description:
At the top secret military base in Roswell, NM, there have been reports of people seeming to have "vanished." In addition, residents have reported seeing strange lights in the nighttime sky, and intermittent, high-pitch noises seem to be coming from all around.
Recently, one of the lead researchers did not return home after an overnight shift in the research lab. The government is refusing comment on the situation. Fortunately, under intense pressure from the public, the Air Force has granted limited access to the facility, and to the task force's journal.
Your team has been tasked with investigating Dr. Ramon Lichtenberg's disappearance and unlocking the mystery surrounding the strange phenomena in Roswell. Can your team stop what is happening before it's too late?
